name: Tail Mail
description:
Take off with Tail Mail, the brand new game about flying through the air! Deliver mail to far-off places, then spend your well-earned coins on furniture for your house! 

- Dodge obstacles while traversing a 3D space 

- Buy furniture at the store 

- Arrange the furniture in your house any way you want 

Features an easy mode for those who like to relax, and a hard mode for those who want a challenge!

(game currently in beta)
